Topic.Title: NEW GAME CODER HAS JOINED THE BATTLE!

Posts.EditableText: Hi! I'm new here and already made a big start! Can any of you play my games?
Posts.HTML: Hi! I'm new here and already made a big start! Can any of you play my games?

Posts.EditableText:
I'd be interested to see what you can create.

I'm curious why a coder would be uploading a bunch of games taken from other sites; that will make it harder for anyone to find the ones you've actually made.
Posts.HTML:
I'd be interested to see what you can create.

I'm curious why a coder would be uploading a bunch of games taken from other sites; that will make it harder for anyone to find the ones you've actually made.

Posts.EditableText: I do not put games with possible copyright infringement in a category.  They will have to be reviewed by higher-ups.  Also (as mrangel pointed out, they are seemingly copied from the internet.
Posts.HTML: I do not put games with possible copyright infringement in a category. They will have to be reviewed by higher-ups. Also (as mrangel pointed out, they are seemingly copied from the internet.
